summary: WHEN TRAVELING 54 MPH ON A 4 LANE HIGHWAY THE TRANSFER CASE COMPONENT SEIZED WITHOUT WARNING AND BOTH REAR TIRES LOCKED. THE CAR SLID ACROSS THE ONCOMING LANES AND ONTO THE SHOULDER OF THE ROAD. BY LUCK I WAS NOT KILLED OR INJURED. THE CAR HAS NEVER BEEN WRECKED AND HAS BEEN WELL MAINTAINED. THERE WAS NO WARNING OF IMPENDING FAILURE.  ****AK DIMS 11 IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****758136.
